settings.question: WHEN WILL I RECEIVE MY GIFT CARD ORDER?
settings.answer:
Plastic gift card orders will be fulfilled within 3 business days plus standard shipping time. Please see below shipping options and estimated fulfilment and delivery times.

Estimated fulfillment + delivery

Regular Mail ($2.00 option): 7-12 business days Express Mail ($14.00 option): 5-7 business days Priority Mail ($20.00 option): 4-5 business days
